import React,{useRef,useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { IoDocumentAttach } from 'react-icons/io5' const Form = () => { const [file, setFile] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [subject,setSubject] = useState("No Subject") const [message, setMessage] = useState("") const [validated,setValidated] = useState(false) const inputFile = useRef(null) const handleClick = e => { inputFile.current.click() } const handleOnChange = e => { setFile(e.target.files) } const validateEmail = () => { } useEffect(() =>{ validateEmail() },[email]) return (
<>
) } export default Form
